info.name: Memory Palace - Personal 3D Memory Management System
info.description:
StartFragment

# Memory Palace - Your Digital Life in 3D Space

**Stop drowning in digital chaos. Start exploring your memories.**

Like most people, I was losing important memories in the endless scroll of emails, photos, and calendar events. Instead of building another folder system, I created something revolutionary: **Memory Palace** - an automated 3D world that transforms your digital life into an explorable, spatial experience.

## What Makes This Different

**Zero-effort setup meets intelligent organization.** Connect your Gmail and Calendar, and watch as your digital memories automatically materialize as interactive 3D objects in a personalized virtual space.

### Features:

- **Fully Automated** - No manual room creation or object placement required
    
- **Real Data Integration** - Your actual emails become explorable 3D objects
    
- **Real-Time Sync** - New memories instantly appear in your palace
    
- **MCP Server Integration** - 3 custom tools for intelligent memory processing
    
- **AI-Powered Insights** - Discover hidden patterns in your digital behavior
    

## The Problem Solved

**Before:** Endless scrolling through Gmail threads, forgotten photos, lost meeting notes **After:** Spatial navigation where work emails appear as cubes in your ‚ÄúProfessional Zone‚Äù and family photos float in your ‚ÄúPersonal Gallery‚Äù - everything positioned based on context, date, and relationships.

## Technical Innovation

**Automated 3D Pipeline:**

```
API Data ‚Üí MCP Processing ‚Üí Laravel Backend ‚Üí Three.js Rendering

 ```

- **Smart Positioning Algorithm** - Prevents overlaps, creates meaningful spatial relationships
    
- **Production Architecture** - Laravel + PostgreSQL + OAuth + Queue Jobs
    
- **Modern Frontend** - React.js + Three.js for smooth 3D interactions
    
- **MCP Tools** - `collect_memories`, `search_memories`, `create_memory_object`

item.name: üöÄ Getting Started

request.description: Verify that the Memory Palace API is running and responsive
Get a complete overview of your memory palace including room count, memory statistics, and recent activity

item.description: Essential endpoints to get your Memory Palace up and running

item.name: ü§ñ MCP Server Integration

request.description:
**MCP Tool: syncViaMP**

Automatically gather memories from all connected services using MCP server integration.

**What happens automatically:**
1. Fetches data from all active connections
2. AI analyzes sentiment and content via MCP
3. Assigns memories to appropriate palace rooms
4. Generates 3D object specifications
5. Creates spatial positioning
Sync a specific API connection using MCP server for intelligent processing.

**MCP Tool: searchViaMP**

Intelligent search across all memories using MCP server with AI-powered filtering and relevance scoring.

**Search capabilities:**
- Full-text search across all memory content
- Sentiment-based filtering
- Type-specific searches
- AI-powered relevance ranking

**Production Gmail Sync**

Direct Gmail data sync using real OAuth tokens. This endpoint:
1. Validates active Gmail connection
2. Fetches real Gmail data using access tokens
3. Processes emails through MemoryCollectionService
4. Returns actual import statistics

item.description: Endpoints that demonstrate MCP (Model Context Protocol) server capabilities

item.name: üìß Memory Collection & Processing

request.description:
Create a new API connection for automated memory collection. The system will:

1. **Create connection record** with your provider details
2. **Generate OAuth URL** for secure authorization
3. **Return authorization link** to complete setup
4. **Enable auto-sync** once authorized

**Supported providers**: gmail, google_calendar, google_photos, spotify, location_services
Update an existing API connection's settings and metadata.
Remove an API connection and stop syncing data from that provider.
Refresh OAuth tokens for a connection to maintain access to external APIs.

item.description: Automated memory collection from various data sources

item.name: üè∞ 3D Palace Management

request.description:
Get all palace rooms for a user with their configuration data.

**Response includes:**
- Room themes and moods
- Color schemes and positioning
- Lighting configuration
- Dimensions and connections
- Active status

body.raw:
{
  "user_id": {{user_id}},
  "name": "Creative Space",
  "description": "Room for creative memories and artistic content",
  "theme": "artistic",
  "mood": "inspiring",
  "color_scheme": ["#ff6b6b", "#4ecdc4", "#45b7d1"],
  "position": {"x": 0, "y": 0, "z": -20},
  "dimensions": {"width": 15, "height": 10, "depth": 15},
  "lighting": {"ambient": 0.4, "directional": 0.8, "color": "#ffd700"},
  "connections": [],
  "is_active": true
}

request.description: Create a new themed room in your memory palace with custom configuration.

Retrieve all 3D memory objects with their complete spatial positioning and rendering data.

**Response includes:**
- 3D coordinates and transformations
- Object geometry and materials
- Animation parameters
- Interaction behaviors
- Associated memory data

body.raw:
{
  "memory_id": 1,
  "palace_room_id": 1,
  "object_type": "email",
  "title": "Important Project Email",
  "description": "Email about Q4 project deliverables",
  "position": {"x": 2.5, "y": 1.5, "z": -1.2},
  "rotation": {"x": 0, "y": 0, "z": 0},
  "scale": {"x": 1.0, "y": 1.0, "z": 1.0},
  "color": ["#10b981", "#065f46", "#047857"],
  "importance_score": 0.8,
  "is_visible": true,
  "is_interactive": true
}

request.description: Create a 3D object representation of a memory with detailed spatial and visual configuration.

item.description: Manage your 3D memory palace structure and objects

item.name: üîç Memory Search & Analytics

request.description:
**Advanced Memory Search**

Powerful search with multiple filtering options and pagination.

**Search features:**
- **Full-text search** across title, content, description
- **Multi-dimensional filtering** by type, sentiment, room, tags
- **Date range queries** for temporal filtering
- **Favorite memories** filtering
- **Paginated results** (20 per page)
- **Sorted by memory date** (newest first)

Powerful search across all memories with multiple filtering options and AI-powered relevance ranking.

**Search features:**
- **Full-text indexing** of all memory content
- **AI-powered relevance** scoring
- **Multi-dimensional filtering** by type, sentiment, room, date
- **Fuzzy matching** for typos and variations

Get comprehensive statistics about your memory collection.

**Statistics include:**
- Total memory count by type
- Sentiment analysis breakdown
- Room distribution
- Recent activity trends
- Import statistics by provider
Get processed memories optimized for 3D palace rendering with spatial data.

Discover AI-powered connections between memories across different platforms and time periods.

**Connection types:**
- **Semantic**: Similar topics, keywords, content themes
- **Temporal**: Memories from same time periods
- **Personal**: Same people, locations, or contexts
- **Causal**: Events that led to other events

item.description: Advanced search and analytics for your memory data

item.name: ‚öôÔ∏è API Configuration & Management

request.description:
**MCP Server Endpoint** - Get user connections without authentication for MCP server use.

View all connected services and their sync status.

**Supported integrations:**
- Gmail (email memories)
- Google Calendar (event memories)
- Google Photos (photo memories)
- Spotify (music memories)
- Location Services (place memories)

View recent processing logs for monitoring sync jobs and data collection activities.

**Log information:**
- Job type and status
- Processing time metrics
- Error messages and debugging info
- Recent 50 entries

Get AI-generated insights about your digital life patterns and memory trends.

**Insights include:**
- Behavioral patterns
- Communication trends
- Memory importance scoring
- Relationship mapping
- Activity recommendations

Manually trigger memory collection from all or specific providers using background jobs.

**Process:**
1. Dispatches CollectMemoriesJob for active connections
2. Jobs run in background queue
3. AI processes and categorizes new memories
4. 3D objects generated automatically
5. Palace updated in real-time

item.description: Manage API connections, settings, and system configuration

item.name: üéÆ Interactive Features Demo

request.description:
**System Health Check**

Verify that all Memory Palace services are running properly.

**Health indicators:**
- Database connectivity
- Cache system status
- Queue system status
- API version information
- Current timestamp
Test API connectivity and authentication status.

query.description: ISO timestamp of last update check

request.description:
**Real-time Palace Synchronization**

Get real-time updates for the 3D palace to synchronize new memories and object changes.

**Update types:**
- **New memories**: Recently imported from APIs
- **Room assignments**: AI-determined palace room placement
- **3D object data**: Position, geometry, materials
- **Memory metadata**: Title, type, sentiment, dates

**Perfect for:**
- Live palace rendering updates
- Real-time memory notifications
- Dynamic 3D scene synchronization

body.raw:
{
  "title": "{{demo_content}}",
  "content": "Sample memory content with important details about the project meeting",
  "type": "email",
  "user_id": {{user_id}},
  "api_connection_id": 1,
  "source_data": {
    "message_id": "msg_123",
    "from": "colleague@company.com",
    "subject": "{{demo_content}}"
  },
  "memory_date": "2024-12-15T10:30:00Z",
  "sentiment": "positive"
}

request.description:
**MCP Server Endpoint** - Create memories directly without authentication for MCP server integration.

This endpoint allows the MCP server to create processed memories with:
- AI-determined sentiment analysis
- Automatic type classification
- Source platform integration
- Metadata preservation
